comments.body: document: is it allowed to consume data from the Reader?

don't we need:

default:
  skipped = append(skipped, t)

?
I don't understand why this package and file are called "recognizer"?

It's a content sniffer - it would look for opening brace, magic number for
protobuf, or yaml begin doc.  Sniffer felt too weird as package name.  Not
married to any particular name.
